creator: tdeverdiere@scort.com
text:
Is it possible to have JNIConnectionHandler and subclass JNIResponseAdapter and 
JNIRequestAdapter in public class in order to access them (maybe having a 
method to get back reqA and resA like Object[] init in TcpConnectionHandler 
method). 
Is it possible to not make 'final' PoolTcpConnector in order to extend it. 
Thanx

Second - done in 3.3. First - JNI adapter will be enhanced as part of j-t-c, 
there are few other optimizations we can do - and part of this we can improve
the interfaces.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: I also solved the first problem ( in 3.3 )
